name: Lufthansa 747-8i [D-ABYL] Firm Windy Landing at Chicago O'Hare ᴴᴰ
description:
Hello everybody, happy Halloween and Happy Heavy Aircraft Friday! Here is first flight on the 747-8 landing in Chicago, the home of the very man who started Heavy Aircraft Friday, O'Hare Aviation himself. The flight was very nice and the service was exceptional for economy, as it always is with Lufthansa! The approach was spectacular as well, with the whole airport visible right in front of my eyes. Final approach was very windy though, and as you'll see, the ailerons were all over the place! I managed to get a picture in picture view of the nose camera on my IFE screen as well, like I did with the A380. So, I hope you enjoy and watch in HD!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Lufthansa (DLH/LH)
Aircraft: Boeing 747-8 Intercontinental
Aircraft Name: "Hessen"
Livery: Standard
Engines: 4x GEnx-2B67
Seat: 30K
Registration: D-ABYL 
Route: FRA-ORD
Callsign: Lufthansa 430 Heavy
Runway used: 10C
Taxiway(s) used: HH, P, GG, D, D4
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DABYL
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG: 
00:13 - Flying over Lake Michigan on approach
00:20 - Still approaching/descending, and Chicago O'Hare International Airport comes into view, several close up shots
01:09 - Banking, heading west, ORD visible just above the wing
02:30 - ORD comes back into view, under the wing. If you hear a camera shutter clicking, that's me attempting to take pictures while filming :P
03:24 - Zooming in on the SE Cargo Ramp
03:50 - Making a quick bank to the right, flaps begin extending
05:25 - Banking to the north now, getting ready to line up with Runway 10C
07:35 - Lined up with the runway, beginning approach
08:13 - Full flaps selected
08:44 - Picture in picture view of my IFE screen, showing the view from the nose camera, lots of aileron action going on
09:36 - Short final, tons of aileron movement
10:01 - A firm but not too hard of a touchdown
10:22 - Eva Air Cargo 747 visible in the background
11:00 - Exiting Runway 10C at Taxiway HH, post-landing announcement begin
12:40 - Asiana Airlines 777-200ER close up after departing Runway 4R (looks like it)
13:30 - Turning into our gate
14:04 - Final stop
____________________________________________________
